3 Web Technologies Prequisites for learning D3 include a basic understanding of: HTML – the language of the web CSS – used for styling web pages, and more importantly for our purposes, selecting elements on a page or in a graphic SVG – the graphics format that we will be using JavaScript – language for making web pages interactive, animated, code is executed when page is opened or refreshed As our focus is D3, not building complex web sites with multiple pages, we will learn minimal amounts of these technologies on a need to know basis. 3.1 HTML 3.2 Learn to use Chrome Developer Tools Opening Chrome: click View, Developer, JavaScript Console. (There are other ways to open Chrome DevTools). Using the JavaScript Console to execute code, not necessarily connected with the current page.
